game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find and retrieve the lost artifact from the ancient ruins
game.description: A local archaeologist has accidentally lost a valuable artifact in a nearby ancient ruins. He is too afraid to go back and retrieve it and is looking for brave adventurers to fetch it.

task.objective: Reach the entrance of the ruins
task.description: Make your way to the ruins which is a day's journey to the east, at the foot of Dragon's Peak.
Rummage through the ruins to find the hidden chamber where the artifact is believed to be lost.
Overcome any challenges, puzzles or traps in the chamber to obtain the lost artifact.
